title: What are the best 20'-24' LED computer monitors? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on your purposes.If you plan to play games, you might need those ones with a fast timing (<3ms).If you want to do high level graphics or coding, you might go for 4K LED monitors.If you need a general purpose monitor, stick with Dell, Samsung monitors, available at a fair price (below 300€).
